body_content.explanation: made in an extremely complicated way and therefore able to do very complicated tasks :
examples: One of the reasons I like the camera is that it doesn't have a super-sophisticated design.
Drawings that were once sketched by hand are now digitized and managed by a supersophisticated computer-aided design program.

body_content.explanation: having an extremely good understanding of the way people behave or an extremely good knowledge of culture and fashion:
examples: He's a nice guy, but not a super-sophisticated businessman.
She dresses casually and makes no claim of being super-sophisticated.
